title: Amazon delivery man runs away terrified after getting spooked by Halloween decorations
text:
Home security footage captured the hilarious moment a delivery man bolted after being spooked by Halloween decorations.

In a video shared on Tuesday, an unsuspecting Amazon delivery man surely wasn't expecting anything out of the ordinary as he walked towards a family's front porch.

In celebration of the season, the family's porch is covered in scary decorations like an evil clown, a coffin and a plethora of other Halloween items.

An Amazon delivery man was startled when he tried to drop off a package and one of the Halloween decorations popped out

In the video, the man walks up the porch steps while carrying a package.

'My dad loves Halloween decorations and he snuck this animatronic spider on to my porch,' the Twitter user FeaRRogue told ViralHog.





The man is briefly distracted by the plethora of spooky decorations and isn't prepared for a unexpected jump scare

Suddenly, an animatronic spider jumps out from a hiding place near the front door and scares the man so much he jumps

FeaRRogue :My dad loves Halloween decorations and he snuck this animatronic spider on to my porch and, uh, well this Amazon guy is in for a surprise'

'And, uh, well this Amazon guy is in for a surprise. Just watch.'

Just as the delivery man is about to drop off the package on the family's doormat, he gets distracted by one of the animotronic decorations in a rocking chair.

That's when a hidden spider pounces out from a hidden crevice and he jumps back in shock.

He then runs back to his truck as all the animotronic decorations begin to move and shake.

The man gives one final look before walking off.

The delivery man quickly runs away before another scary decoration can catch him off guard

The video is quickly gaining views and has almost 1,000 views as of today.

In 2018, The Balance reported that 175 million Americans celebrated Halloween and spent around $9 billion.

This was the second highest spending amount since 2005.

According to a National Retail Federation survey, consumers planed to spent $2.7 million on decorations.
description: Home surveillance footage shows the moment a delivery man got the scare of his life when he was dropping off a package at a home and was frightened by a Halloween decoration
